languages.text: "У нас мало времени, {name}. Я привел тебя сюда, подальше от чужих глаз, потому что должен сообщить нечто очень важное". {n}Он обрывает сам себя, глядя куда-то вам за плечо — то ли осматриваясь, то ли подбирая слова. На его щеках играют желваки, уголок рта непроизвольно дергается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "У нас мало времени, {name}. Я привел тебя сюда, подальше от чужих глаз, потому что должен сообщить нечто очень важное". {n}Он обрывает сам себя, глядя куда-то вам за плечо — то ли осматриваясь, то ли подбирая слова. На его щеках играют желваки, уголок рта непроизвольно дергается.{/n}

languages.text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}
languages.original_text: "У нас мало времени, {name}. languages.text: “我们的时间不多了，{name}。我之所以带你来这里，避开那些窥探的目光，是因为我有非常重要的事情要告诉你。”{n}他支支吾吾地开了口， 目光越过了你。你不知道他是在怀疑有人在盯着他，还是在考虑接下来该说些什么。你注意到，他下巴的肌肉在跳动着，嘴角不受控制地抽搐。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们的时间不多了，{name}。我之所以带你来这里，避开那些窥探的目光，是因为我有非常重要的事情要告诉你。”{n}他支支吾吾地开了口， 目光越过了你。你不知道他是在怀疑有人在盯着他，还是在考虑接下来该说些什么。你注意到，他下巴的肌肉在跳动着，嘴角不受控制地抽搐。{/n}

languages.text: «No tenemos mucho tiempo, {name}. Le he traído aquí, lejos de todas las miradas, porque tengo algo muy importante que contarle». {n}Se detiene y te mira por encima del hombro, no sabes si porque sospecha que os observan o porque intenta elegir sus siguientes palabras. Los músculos de su mandíbula parecen sufrir un tic que hace que mueva constantemente la comisura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No tenemos mucho tiempo, {name}. Le he traído aquí, lejos de todas las miradas, porque tengo algo muy importante que contarle». {n}Se detiene y te mira por encima del hombro, no sabes si porque sospecha que os observan o porque intenta elegir sus siguientes palabras. Los músculos de su mandíbula parecen sufrir un tic que hace que mueva constantemente la comisura.{/n}

languages.text: 「時間がないんだ、{name}ここに連れてきたのは、詮索好きの目から逃れるためだ。大事なことをあなたに伝えなければならない」{n}彼は言葉を切って、あなたの後ろに目線を動かす…観察されていることを疑っているのか、それとも単に次の言葉を選んでいるのか、あなたにはわからない。あなたは、彼が頬をこわばらせ、口角が抑えきれずに痙攣しているのを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「時間がないんだ、{name}ここに連れてきたのは、詮索好きの目から逃れるためだ。大事なことをあなたに伝えなければならない」{n}彼は言葉を切って、あなたの後ろに目線を動かす…観察されていることを疑っているのか、それとも単に次の言葉を選んでいるのか、あなたにはわからない。あなたは、彼が頬をこわばらせ、口角が抑えきれずに痙攣しているのを見た。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous n'avons pas beaucoup de temps, {name}. Si je vous ai {mf|amené|amenée} ici, loin des regards indiscrets, c'est parce que j'ai quelque chose de très important à vous dire. » {n}Il marque une pause le temps de regarder par-dessus votre épaule, mais vous ne sauriez dire si c'est pour vérifier que personne ne vous observe ou pour prendre le temps de peser ses mots. Vous remarquez qu'il serre et desserre constamment les mâchoires et que les coins de sa bouche ne cessent de tressauter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avons pas beaucoup de temps, {name}. Si je vous ai {mf|amené|amenée} ici, loin des regards indiscrets, c'est parce que j'ai quelque chose de très important à vous dire. » {n}Il marque une pause le temps de regarder par-dessus votre épaule, mais vous ne sauriez dire si c'est pour vérifier que personne ne vous observe ou pour prendre le temps de peser ses mots. Vous remarquez qu'il serre et desserre constamment les mâchoires et que les coins de sa bouche ne cessent de tressauter.{/n}

languages.text: "Uns bleibt nicht viel Zeit, {name}. Ich habe Euch hierhergebracht, weg von neugierigen Blicken, weil ich Euch etwas sehr Wichtiges mitteilen muss." {n}Er hält inne und sieht an dir vorbei – entweder weil er misstrauisch ist, dass ihr beobachtet werdet, oder weil er sich seine Worte gut zurechtlegen möchte. Du siehst, wie sich seine Kiefermuskeln bewegen und seine Mundwinkel unkontrolliert zucken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}

Du siehst, wie sich seine Kiefermuskeln bewegen und seine Mundwinkel unkontrolliert zucken.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok vaktimiz yok {name}. Seni buraya, meraklı gözlerden uzağa getirdim çünkü sana söylemem gereken çok önemli bir husus var." {n}Duraksayarak arkana doğru bakıyor. Gözlemlenmekten mi kuşkulanıyor yoksa ağzından çıkacak kelimeleri mi seçiyor, kestiremiyorsun. Yanaklarındaki çene kaslarının titreştiğini ve dudaklarının kenarının kontrol dışı büküldüğünü görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We don't have much time, {name}. I brought you here, away from prying eyes, because I have something very important to tell you." {n}He breaks off, looking past you — whether suspicious of being observed or simply choosing his next words, you cannot say. You see his jaw muscles ticking in his cheeks, and the corner of his mouth twitches uncontrollably.{/n}
